an5.240:1.1: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.240:1.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.240:2.1: A resident mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.240:2.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
